DESCRIPTION: Makes an embed from the embed object you input.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **» Two options to create an embed:**
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}embed [@user] {object}** ~ Embeds the given object. Provide a @User first if you want to use User variables.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **» Possible variables that you can use in embeds:**
EXTENDED_LINE_6: **%authorimage%** ~ Displays the authors image in an image field.
EXTENDED_LINE_9: **%userimage%** ~ Displays the activating users' image in an image field.
EXTENDED_LINE_11: **%guildimage%** ~ Displays the server's image in an image field.
EXTENDED_LINE_12: **»** User variables only work when mentioning a user together with the command.
EXTENDED_LINE_13: **CREATE YOUR EMBED OBJECT ON THIS WEBSITE: <https://embedbuilder.nadekobot.me/>**.
ALIASES: Embed does not have any aliases.
BAD_EMBED: This was not a **valid embed object**. Best is to use the embed builder <https://embedbuilder.nadekobot.me/>!
